plot: Highschool sweethearts, forced to marry other people, cling to their past romance through the child they bore between them and who continues to act as their go-between
title: Gogaereul neomeumyeon
plot_es: Highschool sweethearts, forced to marry other people, cling to their past romance through the child they bore between them and who continues to act as their go-between
plot_en: Highschool sweethearts, forced to marry other people, cling to their past romance through the child they bore between them and who continues to act as their go-between
